outcome: Technocratic Purists implement AI-driven reforms, clashing with pragmatic military curfews.

events.description: AI-driven public advisories replace traditional news, causing confusion among citizens unused to algorithmic narratives.
Military imposes unexpected curfews in multiple districts, citing AI recommendation loophole for heightened security.
Conflicting AI advisories and curfews create disruption in public services and stir heated discussions in Council.
Public protests erupt against AI reforms, demanding human oversight to ensure transparency and trust.
